sentence: the basic question is the role of minimum regulatory capital requirements in the determination of the price and availability of credit.
in some markets, some banks will be relatively passive price takers.

when coupled with the special u.s. features, such as prompt corrective action, minimum leverage ratios, statutory provisions that make capital a prerequisite to exercising additional powers, and market demands for buffer capital, some modest reduction in the minimum regulatory capital for sound, well managed banks could be tolerable.
